name: The Untitled Knight
description:
⚫ Controls

  • Movement = Arrow keys
  • Roll = R
  • Dash = F
  • Jump = Space
  • Wall Climb = Space + Arrow Key Towards Wall
  • Wall leap = Space + Arrow Key Opposite Direction Of Wall
  • Release Wall = Space (while wall sliding)
  • Attack = Q
  • Block =  Hold C
  • Pause Menu =  ESC
  • Best played in 1920x1080 resolution
